title: Manage an Automated Passenger Counting (APC) System
description: An analyst notices that data from an APC system on a bus seems incorrect. They must investigate.

tasks.description: The system flags the APC data from a specific bus as anomalous (e.g., negative passenger counts).
tasks.expected_outcome: The analyst is alerted to the data quality issue.

tasks.description: The analyst reviews the raw data from the bus's APC sensors.
The analyst creates a maintenance ticket to have the APC sensors on that bus inspected and recalibrated.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created for the maintenance team.

tasks.description: The system is configured to exclude the faulty data from any ridership reports until the repair is complete.
tasks.expected_outcome: The bad data is quarantined to ensure report accuracy.
